segments.text: I think if I ’ m going to find a job , I ’ ll look over the job board .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Well , there ’ s no doubt that lots of people have found employment in the help wanted section .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Right , so I picked up a copy of the Sunday Globe this morning .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Did you get a copy of the Herald too ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , why should I ? The Globe ’ s help wanted section is the best .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That ’ s true , but still the Herald lists some jobs the Globe doesn ’ t have .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Not enough to worry about . Why do I waste the money buying two papers ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It's only a couple of dollars more . For that much money you can afford to risk it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I guess you ’ re right . I'll get a Herald as soon as I finish looking over the Globe .
segments.speaker: S1
